mapper.select: SELECT BI.BAKERY_NAME, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, CI.MENU_COUNT FROM CART_INFO ci JOIN CART c ON ci.CART_NO = c.CART_NO JOIN MENU m ON ci.MENU_NO = m.MENU_NO JOIN BAKERY_INFO bi ON BI.BAKERY_NO = M.BAKERY_NO WHERE c.CART_NO = (SELECT max(cart_no) FROM CART c WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) ORDER BY ci.LIST_NO DESC

SELECT SUM(M.MENU_PRICE * CI.MENU_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SUM FROM CART_INFO ci JOIN CART c ON ci.CART_NO = c.CART_NO JOIN MENU m ON ci.MENU_NO = m.MENU_NO JOIN BAKERY_INFO bi ON BI.BAKERY_NO = M.BAKERY_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND c.CART_NO = (SELECT max(cart_no) FROM CART c WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo})
SELECT CART_NO FROM CART c WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY cart_no DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT p.PAY_NO FROM PAYMENT p WHERE p.MERCHANT_UID = #{merchantUid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PICKUP_STATUS VALUES(PICKUP_STATUS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{payNo}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_NO FROM ( SELECT oi.PAY_NO FROM CART_INFO ci JOIN CART c ON ci.CART_NO = c.CART_NO JOIN ORDER_INFO oi ON oi.CART_NO = c.CART_NO WHERE c.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY oi.PAY_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT PICKUP_STATUS_NO, PICKUP_STATUS, REFUSAL_DETAIL FROM PICKUP_STATUS ps WHERE PAY_NO = #{payNo}
SELECT IMP FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAY_NO = #{payNo}

SELECT c.CART_NO , oi.ORDER_NO , oi.PAY_NO , ui.USER_NO , ui.USER_ID FROM CART c JOIN ORDER_INFO oi ON c.CART_NO = oi.CART_NO JOIN USER_INFO ui ON c.USER_NO = UI.USER_NO WHERE ui.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND oi.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT p JOIN ORDER_INFO oi ON p.PAY_NO = oi.PAY_NO JOIN REVIEW r ON r.ORDER_NO = oi.ORDER_NO JOIN USER_INFO ui ON r.USER_NO = ui.USER_NO JOIN BAKERY_INFO bi ON bi.BAKERY_NO = r.BAKERY_NO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.PAY_REQUEST_DATE DESC) AS rn, p.PAY_NO, p.MERCHANT_UID, p.AMOUNT, p.STATUS, p.PAY_REQUEST_DATE, ui.USER_NAME, bi.BAKERY_NAME FROM PAYMENT p JOIN ORDER_INFO oi ON p.PAY_NO = oi.PAY_NO JOIN REVIEW r ON r.ORDER_NO = oi.ORDER_NO JOIN USER_INFO ui ON r.USER_NO = ui.USER_NO JOIN BAKERY_INFO bi ON bi.BAKERY_NO = r.BAKERY_NO ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{limit}

SELECT oi.ORDER_NO FROM ORDER_INFO oi JOIN PAYMENT p ON oi.PAY_NO = p.PAY_NO JOIN CART c ON c.CART_NO = oi.CART_NO JOIN USER_INFO ui ON ui.USER_NO = c.USER_NO JOIN CART_INFO ci ON ci.CART_NO = c.CART_NO JOIN MENU m ON m.MENU_NO = ci.MENU_NO JOIN BAKERY_INFO bi ON bi.BAKERY_NO = m.BAKERY_NO WHERE ui.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND bi.BAKERY_NO = #{bakeryNo}
